about_the_game:
Undercover Investigation! Exposing the Suspicious Sexual Hospitality

The Poppo cult, long rumored to be “selling sex,”

has now been exposed for allegedly providing sexual hospitality to Maegawara, the Justice Minister and a rising star in the Jiken Party.

You, the protagonist, are suddenly tasked with an undercover investigation.

Can you successfully scoop this scandal and meet the deadline for the latest issue?

Full 3D Stealth Action Game!

• Auto-save functionality included.

• Fully supports Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, and Traditional Chinese.

• The objective is to explore the cult’s facilities within a limited time frame (17:00 - 23:00) and locate Congressman Maegawara.

• Will you be distracted by erotic scenes and run out of time, or will you focus on completing the mission assigned by the editorial team? The choice is yours!

This game allows retries after a game over.

Already seen event cutscenes can be skipped, and you can continue without unnecessary interruptions.

• All events and dialogues can be skipped instantly.

• (Some images shown are from the development phase and may differ slightly from the final version, particularly in terms of character accessories, etc.)

Men Being Consumed by the Cult in Exchange for Pleasure

The Fear of Mind Control.

Blessed by the goddess, these men become soldiers who dedicate their lives to the cult…

The Psychological Conditioning of Male Followers

Male followers receive regular counseling from women within the cult, known as “Miko” (priestesses).

Through repeated sessions with multiple priestesses, their devotion to the cult deepens.

The Cult Has Penetrated Politics and Business More Than You Think…

Male followers receive regular counseling from priestesses within the cult.

Through repeated sessions with multiple priestesses, their devotion to the cult deepens.

This influence extends far beyond what you may have imagined.

The cult’s reach into the political and financial world is deeper than you think…
